translation.home_especialidades_text: Special Products to Take Care of You!
translation.home_especialidades_item2_descricao: Enjoy and enjoy the best cosmetic products for you or your salon.
translation.home_especialidades_item3_descricao: State-of-the-art technology in all manufacturing processes.
translation.duvidas_subtitulo: We are ready to help you
translation.home_blog_descricao: New technique of painless locks with high trend in the world of hairdressers.
translation.home_footer_descricao:
Always looking for
the best in the market,
such as imported raw materials
of the highest quality,
and always keeping
an eye on new technologies.
To always improve the quality
to be delivered to beauty professionals.
translation.home_footer_localizacao_endereco: Av Nova Zelândia, 1050 Parque Capuava - Santo André/SP

translation.produtoId_titulo: A premium and best quality preparation just for you!
translation.produtos_titulo: All our products have high quality imported raw materials. Enjoy.
translation.locais_titulo: See where you can find our products
translation.privacidade_subtitulo: At Facinnius, we take privacy seriously.
translation.contato_titulo: Questions or Suggestion? Fill in the fields below to contact us.
translation.sobre_descrição1: Founded in 1998, the company began to have a new management in 2014, thus undergoing reformulations in packaging and formulas. Further improving the quality and excellence of products.
translation.sobre_descrição2: Always looking for the best in the market as imported raw materials of the highest quality, and always on the lookout for new technologies To always improve the quality to be delivered to beauty professionals.
translation.sobre_descrição3: We have a qualified team of representatives, who serve exclusively beauty professionals in their establishments.
translation.sobre_descrição4: With frequent launches that accompany the world market, Facinnius provides in its lines products with exclusive characteristics that present excellent results and satisfaction of its customers.
